page.title: 13My hobbies - dancing and gym
page.content: My hobby is Tap dancing and gymnastics. It is good fun. I do an hour of gym and an hour of tap every Friday from 4pm to 6pm. We do a show every 2 years. There are about 200 people in the show. A lady and her sister teach every one of them. The age ranges from about 3 to 40 year. It costs Â£20 a term. I am taught at Hampton Magna Community Centre with my sister and 13 other girls. We usually wear black leotards and some wear black tights with no feet. We are now going to wear red leotards because of our last show when we wore red leotards for some of the dances. Our dancing teacher didn't like black leotards. I like my hobby because you do dances and I like performing in front of people.
